wikipedia_page.main: Gareth Stuart Gwillim (born 9 January 1983) is an English professional footballer who plays for Ebbsfleet United as a left back.

response: After declaring he wanted to "sort his life out", Blackman signed for Conference National club AFC Wimbledon on 1 June 2010, and made his debut in their 1–0 away win against Southport on 14 August; however, after a handful of appearances, Blackman was declared surplus to requirements and was replaced by Chris Bush, and subsequently Gareth Gwillim.
